name: NY Car Driver City
description:
NY Car Driver City is an extremely adventurous highway racing game. Just enjoy the ultimate racing fever in extreme situations. The highway traffic gives you the amazing and most satisfying traffic escape experience which you would never learn in any driving school.
FEATURES
• Realistic physics of all the vehicles
• Adjust graphics according to your device
• Smooth and realistic car controls including gyro and touch controls
• Realistic HD environment and graphics
• Customize the tires of cars of your choice
